statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, contact_number FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, test_results->'blood_pressure' AS blood_pressure FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_medical_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, test_results->>'cholesterol' AS cholesterol_level FROM patient_medical_records WHERE test_results->'blood_pressure' @> '{"systolic": 120, "diastolic": 80}';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT test_name, result_value, test_date FROM TestResults WHERE result_value > 100;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT test_name, result_value, test_date FROM TestResults WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN TestResults ON Patients.patient_id = TestResults.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'M' ORDER BY TestResults.test_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(result_value) AS average_result_value FROM TestResults;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE contact_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, phone_number FROM patients WHERE height > 170;
SELECT full_name, weight FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY full_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, height FROM patients WHERE height > 150 AND weight < 70
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31'
SELECT p.full_name, tr.test_name, tr.result_text FROM patients p INNER JOIN test_results tr ON p.patient_id = tr.patient_id
SELECT c.consultation_id, c.consultant_name, p.full_name FROM consultations c INNER JOIN patients p ON c.patient_id = p.patient_id ORDER BY c.consultation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT Doctors.name, Doctors.specialization, Patients.name AS patient_name FROM Doctors JOIN Patients ON Doctors.specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT Patients.name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, TestResults.test_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id JOIN TestResults ON Patients.patient_id = TestResults.patient_id WHERE Patients.age < 50;

SELECT Doctors.name, Doctors.specialization, Patients.name AS patient_name, TestResults.result FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Patients ON Doctors.doctor_id = Patients.patient_id INNER JOIN TestResults ON Patients.patient_id = TestResults.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.name, COUNT(MedicalHistory.record_id) AS num_records FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = Medicaljson()History.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.name HAVING num_records > 2;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialist_area FROM Doctors WHERE specialist_area = 'Cardiology';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, medications, prescription_date FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MedicalRecords WHERE prescription_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TestResults WHERE test_type = 'Blood Test' AND test_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Doctors.specialist_area, COUNT(*) AS total_doctors FROM Doctors GROUP BY Doctors.specialist_area ORDER BY total_doctors DESC;
